pages.text: 21|91|Arau smarana karaa se'ijani naraika, yiye nija lajjasthanara hiphajata karaichila, seye tara majata ami amara rauha phuraa'i dilo. Te'omka arau te'omra putraka srstijagatara babe eta nidarsana bana'i dilo.
21|92|Niscaya tomalokara e'i jati prakrtate eta'i jati arau maye'i tomalokara raba, eteke tomaloke kerala morae'i ibadata karaa.
21|93|Kintu sihamte nijara karyakalapara majata bibheda srsti karaiche. Pratyeke'i amara ocarata pratyarartanakarai.
21|94|Eteke yadi konoba'i mumina hai satkarma karae tente tara pracesta ketiya'o asbikara karaa naha’ba arau niscaya ami iyara lipibad'dhakarai.
21|95|Arau ami yi janapadaka dhbansa karaicho tara babe nisedhajna ache ye, niscaya tara adhibasisakale ketiya'o ghurai nahiba
21|96|Arasesata yetiya iya’juja arau ma’jujaka mukti diya ha’ba arau sihamte pratito uccabhumira paraa daurai ahiba.

21|97|Arau amogha pratisrauta samaya nikatararti ha’le akasmikabharae kaphirasakalara caku sthira hai yaba, sihamte ka’ba, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara! Arasye ami e'i bisaye udasina achilo; baram ami achilo yalima’.
21|98|Niscaya tomaloke arau allahara paraibarte tomaloke yiborara ibadata karaa se'i sakalobora haiche jahannamara indhana; tomaloka ataye tata praraesa karaiba.
21|99|Yadi sihamta ilaha ha’lehemtena tente sihamta jahannamata praraesa nakarailehemtena; arau sihamta ataye tata sthayi ha’ba
21|100|tata thakiba sihamtara cinamra-bakhara arau artanada, se'i karane sihamte tata ekorae suna napaba
21|101|niscaya amara taraphara paraa yisakalara babe purbarae paraa kalyana nirdharaita ache te'omlokaka iyara paraa amtarata rakha ha’ba.
